tool.name: synthesisiterbot
tool.description: synthesisiterbot is an tool that accomplishes synthesis processing. A {\tt synthesisiterbot} must be constructed for each MeasurementSet for which one wishes to do processing. Multiple copies of {\tt synthesisiterbot} may be made at any time (provide they are given different names).

method.name: synthesisiterbot
method.description: This is used to construct {\tt synthesisiterbot} tool.

method.name: setupiteration
method.shortdescription: Set parameters to control iteration mechanisms

method.name: cleanComplete
method.shortdescription: Return true when we have completed this clean

param.name: lastcyclecheck
param.description: Check using peak residual before major cycle.

method.name: endmajorcycle
method.shortdescription: Record the end of a major cycle

method.name: resetminorcycleinfo
method.shortdescription: Reset info about peak residual and masks, before start minor cycles

method.name: getminorcyclecontrols
method.shortdescription: Get the controller for a minor cycle

method.name: mergeexecrecord
method.shortdescription: Update the iterbot with iteration stats from the deconvolver

param.name: execrecord
param.description: Pass in the output of synthesisdeconvolver.executeminorcycle()

method.name: changestopflag
method.shortdescription: Change the stop flag (for interactive clean)

param.name: stopflag
param.description: Set to False for the next cleanComplete() check to stop the run

method.name: mergeinitrecord
method.shortdescription: Initialize the iterbot with starting peak residuals

param.name: initrecord
param.description: Pass in the output of synthesisdeconvolver.initminorcycle()

method.name: getiterationdetails
method.shortdescription: Return a record with the details of the iteration

method.name: getiterationsummary
method.shortdescription: Return a record with a summary of the iteration
